root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 16-1-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: Ratio of the population likely to be the victim of criminal violence in the past 12 months and the total population, expressed as a percentage
Rapport entre la population susceptible d'être victime de violences d'ordre criminel au cours des 12 derniers mois et la population totale, exprimée en pourcentage
